verses.verse: <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> your <S%H4941>justice;<s%> your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to the <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>
He will <S%H1777>judge<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and your <S%H6041>poor<s%> with <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> to the <S%H5971>people.<s%> The <S%H1389>hills<s%> bring the fruit of <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%> He will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> and will break the <S%H6231>oppressor<s%> in <S%H1792>pieces.<s%>
They shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> you <S%H5973>while<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H6440>endures;<s%> and as long as the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
He will come <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H4306>rain<s%> on the <S%H1488>mown<s%> <S%H7241>grass,<s%> as showers that <S%H2222>water<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
In his <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish,<s%> and <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> until the moon is no <S%H3394>more.<s%>
He shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> also from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea,<s%> from the <S%H5104>River<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Those who dwell in the <S%H6728>wilderness<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H341>him.<s%> His enemies shall <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> and of the <S%H339>islands<s%> will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H4503>tribute.<s%> The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H5434>Seba<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H814>gifts.<s%>
<S%H4428>Yes,<s%> all kings shall fall <S%H7812>down<s%> before <S%H1471>him.<s%> All nations shall serve <S%H5647>him.<s%>
For he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> when he <S%H7768>cries;<s%> the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> who has no <S%H5826>helper.<s%>
He will have <S%H2347>pity<s%> on the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H1800>needy.<s%> He will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H34>needy.<s%>
He will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H8496>oppression<s%> and <S%H2555>violence.<s%> Their <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

They shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and to him shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> of the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba.<s%> Men shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> for him <S%H8548>continually.<s%> They shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> him all day <S%H3117>long.<s%>

<S%H6451>Abundance<s%> of <S%H1250>grain<s%> shall be throughout the <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H7218><s%> <S%H2022>Its<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H7493>sways<s%> like <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%> Let <S%H5892>it<s%> <S%H6692>flourish,<s%> thriving like the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>field.<s%>

His <S%H8034>name<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5125>continues<s%> as long <S%H6440>as<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%> Men shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> by <S%H1471>him.<s%> All nations will call him <S%H833>blessed.<s%>
<S%H1288>Praise<s%> be to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who alone <S%H6213>does<s%> marvelous <S%H6381>deeds.<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be his <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever!<s%> Let the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with his <S%H3519>glory!<s%> <S%H543>Amen<s%> and <S%H543>amen.<s%>
This <S%H3615>ends<s%> the <S%H8605>prayers<s%> by <S%H1732>David,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse.<s%>
